subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] get your news in QS!
msgSnippet: ... I m not sure what users want here. Do you want me to make the margin larger or smaller? Right now, the PDF is in two columns. The font is not a series of
messageBody:
Terry Smithwick wrote:
>
>
> I'd like to second the request below. Both PDF
> readers I use (Adobe and Foxit) can scale and print
> pages on my printer, but neither can remove a margin
> that's already there.
> And I can't cut & paste the font, it's apparently a
> series of images.
>

I'm not sure what users want here. Do you want me to make the margin
larger or smaller? Right now, the PDF is in two columns. The font is not
a series of images so far as I know; it is regular text encoded in the
Unicode set of QS. I use the Thoth font with XeLaTex, if that helps.

Paul
